fgeo.base 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference
  • Changelog
  • fgeo

Common fgeo functions with no external depencency

The goal of fgeo.base is to provide functions with no external depencency. This makes it easy to import into any fgeo package withouth carrying any dependency, which helps keep each fgeo package as small and independent as possible.

Installation

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("forestgeo/fgeo.base")

For details on how to install packages from GitHub, see this article.
